content:
I need to verification on my FHIR Read Resources I have implemented. How I can verify that I have worked as per standard. Is there any forum for the verification of my FHIR Read Resources?
I am currently working for API integration with a third party using FHIR.
There are a number of testing tools you can point at your server that will beat on it for you. @Richard Ettema ?

Ali, please have a look at our FHIR testing platform -> Touchstone http://touchstone.com.
Thanks.
